original_title: The Space Shuttle: Countdown to Comeback
overview: Discovery Channel documentary which goes behind the scenes with NASA's Space Shuttle programme. Narrated by actor Gary Sinise, the documentary counts down to the launch of the Space Shuttle Discovery - the first Shuttle to prepare for take-off since the February 2003 disaster in which seven astronauts were lost when the Space Shuttle Columbia disintegrated above Texas.
title: The Space Shuttle: Countdown to Comeback
